Package: uniandes.unacloud.web.controllers

[Groovy] Class ImageController

    • uniandes.unacloud.web.controllers.ImageController

    • This Controller contains actions to manage image services: crud and services to send messages to agents to copy or deletes images. This class render pages to user or process requests to update entities, there is session verification before all actions

      Authors:
      CesarF

      • Properties Summary

          Properties 
          Type Name and description
          java.lang.Object  beforeInterceptor
          Makes session verifications before executing any action
          ImageService  imageService
          Representation of image services
          ServerVariableService  serverVariableService
          Representation of server variable service

      • Methods Summary

          Methods 
          Type Name and description
          java.lang.Object clearFromCache()
          Requests delete image files from every ACTIVE physical machine Verifies if image is AVAILABLE
          java.lang.Object copyPublic()
          Creates a copy from a public image.
          java.lang.Object delete()
          Verifies if the image is being used, then acquires the repository when it is deposited and send deletion request.
          java.lang.Object edit()
          Validates if image can be edited by user and render view
          java.lang.Object external()
          This action renders view to change the externalId reference in external cloud provider
          java.lang.Object index()
          Action by default
          java.lang.Object list()
          Image index action
          java.lang.Object newFromPublic()
          New Image from public one action
          java.lang.Object newUploadImage()
          New uploaded image form action
          java.lang.Object saveEdit()
          Saves image information changes.
          java.lang.Object update()
          Render image page, returns to list in case it does'nt exists
          java.lang.Object updateFiles()
          Validates file parameters are correct and save new files for the image.
          java.lang.Object upload()
          Validates file parameters are correct and save new uploaded image.

          Makes session verifications before executing any action

      • Constructor Detail

        • ImageController()

      • Method Detail

        • java.lang.Object clearFromCache()

          Requests delete image files from every ACTIVE physical machine Verifies if image is AVAILABLE

        • java.lang.Object copyPublic()

          Creates a copy from a public image. Redirects to index when finished

        • java.lang.Object delete()

          Verifies if the image is being used, then acquires the repository when it is deposited and send deletion request. Redirects to index when finished or to and error message if the validation processes failed

        • java.lang.Object edit()

          Validates if image can be edited by user and render view

        • java.lang.Object external()

          This action renders view to change the externalId reference in external cloud provider

        • java.lang.Object index()

          Action by default

        • java.lang.Object list()

          Image index action

          Returns:
          list of all images related to user

        • java.lang.Object newFromPublic()

          New Image from public one action

        • java.lang.Object newUploadImage()

          New uploaded image form action

          Returns:
          list of OS for user selection

        • java.lang.Object saveEdit()

          Saves image information changes. Redirects to index when finished

        • java.lang.Object update()

          Render image page, returns to list in case it does'nt exists

          Returns:
          id of the image to be edited.

        • java.lang.Object updateFiles()

          Validates file parameters are correct and save new files for the image. Redirects to index when finished or renders an error message if uploaded files are not valid.

        • java.lang.Object upload()

          Validates file parameters are correct and save new uploaded image. Redirects to index when finished or renders an error message if uploaded files are not valid.
